The claim was fact: checked by scientists who estimated that the Amazon produces closer to 6 to 9% of the world's oxygen, not 20%.
News outlets: including ABC, CNN, and Newsweek, spread the false claim that the Amazon produces 20% of the world's oxygen.
Politicians: such as Sen. Kamala Harris, repeated the inaccurate claim to draw attention to the Amazon fires.
Environmental scientists: like Jonathan Foley, shared their own calculations on social media, stating that the Amazon produces around 6% or less of the planet's oxygen.
